Package app.src.resources.monsters

Class MonsterSpawner

java.lang.Object
app.src.resources.monsters.MonsterSpawner
Direct Known Subclasses:
WaveSpawner
public class MonsterSpawner extends Object
Contains utilities to Spawn new Monsters

  • Constructor Details

    • MonsterSpawner

      public MonsterSpawner(int lowerSpawnTime, int upperSpawnTime, Point playerLocation)
      Takes a lower and upper limit for the delay before the next Monster is spawned to create a MonsterSpawner
      Parameters:
      lowerSpawnTime - lower limit for the delay before the next Monster is spawned
      upperSpawnTime - upper limit for the delay before the next Monster is spawned
      playerLocation - Sets the playerLocation on which the spawn point is dependent on.

  • Method Details

    • getMonsterCount

      public int getMonsterCount()
      Returns the number of already spawned Monsters.
      Returns:
      Monster count

    • updateMonsterPool

      public void updateMonsterPool(List<MonsterValues> monsters)
      Removes all monsters from the Monster pool.
      Parameters:
      monsters - New List of Monsters

    • spawnCheck

      public Boolean spawnCheck()
      Checks, if the Spawner is on cooldown. Sets the cooldown to max, if its lower than 0.
      Returns:
      false, when the Spawner is on cooldown

    • registerMonster

      public void registerMonster(MonsterValues monster)
      Adds a Moster type to the Spawn pool.
      Parameters:
      monster - MonsterValues

    • spawnMonster

      public Monster spawnMonster()
      Takes a Monster type by random from the pool, Creates the Monster and returns it.
      Returns:
      random Monster from the pool
